maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Satoshi !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... Sister...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ... Shizuka... petite sœur...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.note: only the german version describe shizuka as 'grosse schwester' and it's probably from the point of view of Lea. it's hard to not make it too theatrical.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: What do you think you're doing?!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais qu'est-ce qui te prends ?!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You are in no condition to do this kind of work now!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Tu ne peux pas continuer à travailler dans cet état !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: All you should do is rest...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Tout ce que tu devrais faire, c'est te reposer...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... Why should I rest when I'm way beyond recovery?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ... Pourquoi je devrais me reposer, alors que mon temps est déjà compté ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I need to finish this work. It's my final task.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il faut que je finisse ce travail. Ce sera ma dernière tâche.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... I told you about the agreement.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ... Je t'ai déjà parlé de l'arrangement.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I finish this and they will let you go...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Si je finis ça, ils te laisseront partir...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... No, I don't want this!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ... Non, je ne veux pas de ça !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi... Stop it...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Satoshi... Écoute-moi...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... It is done.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ... C'est fini.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: No!!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Non !!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka... I'm sorry...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Shizuka... Je suis désolé...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I'm so sorry I got you involved in this.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je suis désolé de t'avoir impliqué là-dedans.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Just promise me...\. that you will...\. get away...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Promets-moi juste...\. que tu...\. partiras d'ici.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Please...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: S'il te plaît...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hello again, Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Rebonjour, Lea.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Do you think you are prepared to execute the plan?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Tu penses que tu es bien préparée pour démarrer le plan ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Mind that once we start, things will have to move quickly.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Pense que dès que l'on aura commencé, il faudra aller vite.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So, are you ready?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Donc, est-ce que tu es prête ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright then, let's get everyone together.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK alors, il faut tous se réunir.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright. Talk to me when the time has come.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK. Reviens me voir quand le temps sera venu.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [yes]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [oui]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [no]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [non]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hello again, Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Rebonjour, Lea.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You should know what to do. Let's hurry and proceed with the plan.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Tu devrais savoir quoi faire. Dépêche-toi et concentre-toi sur le plan.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]
... Salut ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Is...\. is that?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Est-ce...\. Est-ce que... ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It...\. it really happened.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ça...\. ça a vraiment marché.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi...\. finally...\. we found you!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Satoshi...\. Enfin...\. On t'a retrouvé !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Lea...\. you are here...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Lea...\. tu es là...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Does that mean...\. is he with you as well?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que ça signifie...\. qu'il est avec toi ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright. This way, please.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK. Viens par là, s'il te plaît.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Make sure he can read the number of this device.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Fais en sorte qu'il puisse lire le numéro sur cet appareil.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It's possible to connect to it using an IDN-Client.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'est possible de s'y connecter avec un client IDN.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh? Just make sure to look closely at the number, Lea!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oh ? Il va falloir regarder le numéro de très près, Lea !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright...\. one moment please.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK...\. Un moment s'il te plaît.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi...\. I am so glad to see you again.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Satoshi...\. Je suis si heureux de te revoir.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Same for me.\. It has been too long...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Pareil pour moi.\. Cela fait depuis si longtemps...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: S-Sergey?\. Is that you?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: S-Sergey ?\. C'est toi ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I'm sure you have a lot of questions, but before we continue, let me start a little program.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je suis sûr que tu as plein de questions, mais avant de continuer, laisse-moi lancer un petit programme.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright, let's stay close and talk quietly.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK, restons proches les un des autres et baissons d'un ton.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: This room is monitored.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Cette salle est surveillée.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Having this noise around us should sufficiently mess with the protocol.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Avec ce bruit autour de nous, on devrait suffisamment perturber le protocole.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: At least for some time.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Au moins pendant quelque temps.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I see...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je vois...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well then... allow me to get straight to the point.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bon alors... allons directement aux faits.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sergey, you should already know about Evotars.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Sergey, tu dois déjà être au courant pour les Évotars.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Is Lea...\. aware about herself as well?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que Lea...\. sait ce qu'elle est ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes...\. she is.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui...\. elle le sait.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Good...\. this will make things much easier.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bien...\. cela va rendre les choses plus faciles.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Lea, let me start by saying that you are, in fact, the \c[3]first functional Evotar\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Lea, laisse-moi commencer par te dire que tu es, en fait, le \c[3]premier Évotar fonctionnel\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Minus a few remaining technical issues... like your \c[3]malfunctioning speech module\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: À l'exception de quelques petits problèmes techniques... comme ton \c[3]module vocal défectueux\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Why?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Wait...\. so I didn't imagine it? You can talk?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Attends...\. donc je ne l'ai pas rêvé ? Tu peux parler ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Partially... I hard-coded a few words into her module.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Partiellement... J'ai codé en dur quelques mots dans son module.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I wasn't even aware that was an option...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je ne savais même pas que c'était possible...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You always manage to surprise me, Sergey.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Tu continues toujours à me surprendre, Sergey.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Are you also responsible for the \c[1]insane amount of damage\c[0] she's dealing?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Et c'est toi aussi qui est responsable des \c[1]dégâts délirants\c[0] qu'elle cause ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Ah...\. yes.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ah...\. oui.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Though it wasn't intended... and unfortunately I couldn't remove it once I got her into the game.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais bon, ce n'était pas volontaire... et je ne pouvais pas les enlever après l'avoir fait entrer dans le jeu.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: \c[1]Great work\c[0].\. That duel sure was a lot of fun.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ah ben \c[1]Bravo, Sergey !\c[0]\. Je me suis jamais autant amusé dans un duel, vraiment !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Anyway.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, bon.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It is nothing, please go on.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'est rien, continue.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Let me tell you what happened after Gautham, Shizuka, and I left Instatainment.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Laisse-moi te dire ce qui est arrivé après que Gautham, Shizuka et moi avons quitté Instatainment.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Isn't the weather just fantastic today?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Le temps n'est-il pas fantastique aujourd'hui ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Indeed! The sun is shining, it's fantastic, the best!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, le soleil brille, c'est fantastique, ça ne peut pas être mieux !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Let's all go out and play!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Allons dehors pour s'amuser !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, let's go out and play!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, on joue dehors !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Plaaay!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Jeuuuu !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: But before that I have to finish work.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais avant ça je dois finir mes devoirs.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Awwwww...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oh, nooooon...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Le taux de criminalité à très fortement progressé récemment.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui. Et au même moment, on manque de personnel.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Si cela continue, je ne suis pas sûr que l'on puisse continuer à protéger nos citoyens.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sad, but true...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'est triste, mais c'est vrai...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: J'ai entendu qu'ils ont découvert une nouvelle entrée du temple dans les montagnes.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oh ! Tu penses qu'on pourra y trouver de nouveaux trésors ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Surement, mais il faut se dépêcher ! Tout le monde doit être en train de se préparer pour rentrer !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right, we should start preparations at once!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, il faut commencer les préparations dès maintenant !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: J'ai entendu qu'ils ont découvert une nouvelle entrée du temple dans les montagnes.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oh ! Tu penses qu'on pourra y trouver de nouveaux trésors ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Surement, mais il faut se dépêcher ! Tout le monde doit être en train de se préparer pour rentrer !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right, we should start preparations at once!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, il faut commencer les préparations dès maintenant !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Nous Shad être très nobles, liés avec Anciens !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais nous avoir problème avec langue Humain !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais parce que langue humaine très compliquée. Trop de mots et règles tordues !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So true! We should help human make language simple!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Si vrai ! Nous devoir aider humain faire langage simple !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Great idea!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Super idée !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Nous Shad être très nobles, liés avec Anciens !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais nous avoir problème avec langue Humain !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais parce que langue humaine très compliquée. Trop de mots et règles tordues !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So true! We should help human make language simple!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Si vrai ! Nous devoir aider humain faire langage simple !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Great idea!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Super idée !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Le taux de criminalité à très fortement progressé récemment.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui. Et au même moment, on manque de personnel.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Si cela continue, je ne suis pas sûr que l'on puisse continuer à protéger nos citoyens.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sad, but true...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'est triste, mais c'est vrai...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The stocks have been rather good this week.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Le marché à l'air de se porter bien cette semaine.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Very much, I made a good fortune.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, j'ai gagné une petite fortune.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Speculation and stuff.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Avec de la spéculation et tout.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Business, business.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Affaires, Affaires.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Privatize everything!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Privatisez tout !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The stocks have been rather good this week.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Le marché à l'air de se porter bien cette semaine.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Very much, I made a good fortune.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, j'ai gagné une petite fortune.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Speculation and stuff.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Avec de la spéculation et tout.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Business, business.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Affaires, Affaires.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Privatize everything!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Privatisez tout !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well...\. Not that it mattered to me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bon...\. Ce n'est pas comme si cela changeait quelque chose pour moi.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Do you mean...\. your heart disease?\. Please do not tell me...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Tu veux dire...\. ton problème de cœur ?\. Ne me dis pas que...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I'm sorry...\. The Satoshi you knew died two years ago.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je suis désolé...\. Le Satoshi que tu connaissais est mort il y a deux ans.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Standing in front of you...\. is the \c[3]Evotar of Satoshi\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ce qui se tient en face de toi...\. est l'\c[3]Évotar de Satoshi\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: No...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Non...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I myself created this copy as an offer to Mr. Sidwell, so I could continue to serve him.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je me suis créé cette copie de moi-même pour faire une offre à Mr. Sidwell, pour que je puisse continuer à le servir.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: In return, I wanted him to let Shizuka go.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: En échange, je voulais qu'il laisse Shizuka partir.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I was naive to ever think he'd fulfill his end of the agreement.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: J'étais naïf de croire qu'il respecterait sa part de l'accord.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I...\. I cannot believe this...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je...\. Je ne peux pas le croire...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Don't feel sorry, Sergey.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ne sois pas triste, Sergey.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Nothing could have been done about my disease anyway.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il n'y avait rien à faire pour ma maladie de toute façon.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Becoming an Evotar was the only option for me to stay in this world.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Devenir un Évotar était la seule possibilité pour rester en ce monde.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We need to switch rooms now.\. Otherwise the masking will lose its effect.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il faut changer de pièce maintenant.\. Sinon le masquage va perdre de son effet.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Follow me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Suivez-moi.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Satoshi...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You two are still at it?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Vous n'avez toujours pas fini vous deux ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I think we're done for the most part.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je pense qu'on a fait la plus grosse partie.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Though there is one more thing.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais il reste une chose à discuter.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka, how is \c[3]Gautham\c[0] doing these days?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Shizuka, comment va \c[3]Gautham\c[0] en ce moment ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well...\. I didn't speak much with him recently.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ben...\. Ces derniers temps je n'ai pas trop discuté avec lui.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He's busy designing his levels and flying around in his fancy avatar.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il est trop occupé à concevoir ses niveaux et à voler partout dans son super avatar.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He seems content enough.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il a l'air d'être assez content.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Gautham... it might be especially difficult to get him out of this.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Gautham... cela risque d'être extrêmement difficile de le sortir de là.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We did in fact meet him while we were in Evotarground.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: En fait, on l'a rencontré pendant qu'on était sur le Terrain des Évotars.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: From what we saw... it looked like he is physically located in the Playground. Could that be the case?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: De ce qu'on a vu... on dirait qu'il était physiquement présent sur le Terrain de Jeu. Est-ce que ça pourrait être le cas ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes.\. Somehow, Sidwell convinced him to do that.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui.\. Je ne sais pas comment, mais Sidwell l'en a convaincu.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It is easier to keep him under control that way.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'était plus facile de le garder sous contrôle comme cela.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: And well...\. Gautham was always excited about creating his own worlds.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Et puis bon...\. Gautham a toujours rêvé de pouvoir créer ses propres mondes.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The prospect of experiencing it in person was quite appealing to him.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: L'idée de pouvoir le voir de ses propres yeux, cela l'a toujours attiré.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Really...\. I think he's a lost cause.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Vraiment...\. Je pense que c'est un cas désespéré.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He's stuck in his fantasy world, playing his little god figure...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il est coincé dans son monde fantastique, en train de jouer son petit dieu...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That blue avatar with orange clothing?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Cet avatar bleu avec des vêtements orange ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, that's him.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui, c'est lui.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That is... unexpected. He acts like such a different character.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ça me surprend... Il agit vraiment comme s'il était quelqu'un d'autre.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That's the whole point.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'est justement pour ça.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: In any case, we should try to figure out if he's on our side with this or not.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Dans tous les cas, il faut que l'on essaie de savoir s'il est de notre côté ou non.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka, can you try talking to him about this?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Shizuka, est-ce que tu peux essayer de lui parler de ça ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Just hinting at what is happening?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Juste en lui donnant quelques indices sur ce qu'il se passe ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I can try...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je peux essayer...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well then... I think I have a good grasp of the situation now.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bon alors... Je pense que j'ai une bonne idée de la situation maintenant.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We will need time for preparations though.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: On va avoir encore besoin de temps pour les préparations, par contre.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Certainly. If you have any more questions, you know how to reach me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Certainement. Si tu as plus de questions, tu sais comment me joindre.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes...\. I am glad I was able to meet both of you again.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui...\. Je suis content d'avoir pu vous revoir.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Same for me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Pareil pour moi.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: One last thing, though.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Encore une chose, par contre.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Looking at what Sidwell accomplished so far, I'm certain he has specific ways to track your actions.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Quand je pense à ce que Sidwell a été capable de faire jusqu'à présent, je suis certain qu'il a un moyen de suivre vos traces.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Because of that, please be extra careful if you plan to involve any other player.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Donc, soyez très prudent si vous comptez impliquer d'autres joueurs.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I will... and I already have my suspects.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je le serais... et j'ai déjà mes suspects.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well then...\. goodbye and see you soon.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bon alors...\. Portez-vous bien et à plus.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Goodbye.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Au revoir.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Take care.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Soyez prudent.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Bye!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bye !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You too, Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Toi aussi, Lea.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Okay, where to start...?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK, Par où on commence... ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I looked a bit more into the technical side of things.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: J'ai regardé un peu le côté technique des choses.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The Evotar Server is most likely derived from an old version of the official game servers.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Le Serveur des Évotars est très probablement dérivé d'une vieille version des serveurs officiels du jeu.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That means it should be vulnerable to a certain DoS attack we experienced in the past.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Cela veut dire qu'il devrait être vulnérable à certaines attaques DoS que l'on a subi par le passé.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh... using the hit-stun-overflow issue?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ah... Le problème du Hit-Stun-Overflow ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Correct!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Correct !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Now please for us common folks, too.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Vous pourriez aussi traduire ça pour les gens normaux ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well, in other words...\. there is a way to make the Evotar Server \c[3]crash\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bon, en d'autres termes...\. Il y a un moyen pour faire \c[3]planter\c[0] le Serveur des Évotars.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Crash very, very badly.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais vraiment bien le faire planter.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Once it happens, Sidwell will have a hard time restarting it.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Lorsque ça arrivera, Sidwell aura beaucoup de mal à le faire redémarrer.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Thus, the server will not respond to anything, including queries to wipe the data.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Du coup, le serveur ne réagira à rien, et encore moins aux ordres pour effacer les données.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That will give us enough time for Lea to reach it physically.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Cela devrait nous donner assez de temps pour que Lea puisse l'atteindre physiquement.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That sounds very promising!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Cela a l'air d'être prometteur !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So, how exactly will it work?\. How do we make it crash?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais, comment ça va marcher ?\. Comment on le fait planter ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The keys are the \c[3]Evotars\c[0] running around Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: La clef, ce sont les \c[3]Évotars\c[0] qui se trouve dans \v[area.arid.name].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We need to subject them to a certain type of field effect, as many and as quickly as possible.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il faut les soumettre à un certain type d'effet de zone, aussi rapidement que possible.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: If we succeed, things should overflow on the Server, making it crash.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Si on y arrive, le serveur devrait arriver à bout de souffle et il devrait planter.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: However, for this to work...\. we will need a lot more players to participate.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Mais, pour que cela marche...\. on va avoir besoin de la participation de bien plus de joueurs.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That's why I plan to involve a few other players, specifically those Lea has met before.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: C'est pour cela que je compte impliquer d'autres joueurs, plus spécifiquement, ceux que Lea a déjà rencontré.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Involving other players...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Impliquer d'autres joueurs...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I suppose it's a risk we have to take.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je suppose que c'est un risque qu'il faut prendre.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I currently see no other options, unfortunately.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je ne vois pas d'autres options, malheureusement.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So...\. what about me?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Et...\. À propos de moi ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I can't enter the official Playground, but I can move around Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je peux pas aller dans le Terrain de Jeu officiel, mais je peux me déplacer librement à \v[area.arid.name].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Should I help?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Est-ce qu'il faut que j'aide ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hm...\. I think it would be better if you avoid logging into the game while we storm the Evotarground.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Hum... Je pense que cela serait mieux si tu évitais d'être connecté au jeu pendant que l'on envahit le Terrain des Évotars.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Since Sidwell is aware of your current location outside the game, you need to be quickly relocated.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Vu que Sidwell est au courant de là où tu es en dehors du jeu, il faut que tu déménages rapidement.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Otherwise, things will end with him taking you hostage.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Sinon, les choses vont se terminer avec lui qui te prendra en otage.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right...\. there is the real life side of things as well.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Oui...\. Il y a aussi la vie réelle qu'il ne faut pas oublier.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: One last thing, did you manage to talk with Gautham?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Encore une chose... Est-ce que tu as réussi à parler avec Gautham ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I tried.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: J'ai essayé.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He has been acting...\. very strange.\. Even more strange than usual.\. And that's saying a lot.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Il se comporte de manière...\. très étrange.\. Encore plus étrange que d'habitude.\. Et ça en dit beaucoup.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Once I mentioned Lea, he started raving about how she managed to escape his dungeon tower.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Une fois que j'ai mentionné Lea, Il ne parlait plus que de comment elle a réussi à s'échapper de sa tour.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I guess you really left an impact.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: On dirait que tu as vraiment eu un effet sur lui.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Anyway...\. I decided I'd better not tell him too much.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: En tout cas...\. J'ai décidé de ne pas trop lui en dire.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Really...\. he's pretty much turned into a nutcase by now.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Vraiment...\. Il est devenu complètement cinglé.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.note: de: il n'a plus toutes ses tasses dans son placard ^^

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... That is worrisome.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ... C'est inquiétant.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We will see if we can drag him out somehow.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: On va voir si on a un moyen de le trainer hors de là.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I know a few people from the maintenance crew that might be able to help us with this.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Je connais quelques personnes de l'équipe de maintenance qui pourraient nous aider pour cela.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Good...\. then how do we proceed?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bien...\. Alors comment on procède ?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: For now, we should call it a day.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Pour l'instant, on peut se dire que c'est tout pour aujourd'hui

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: As soon as I have everything prepared, Lea and I will try to gather the other players.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Aussitôt que j'aurais tout préparé, Lea et moi irons rassembler les autres joueurs.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: And once we have the help we need, we start with the plan as soon as possible.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Et une fois qu'on aura toute l'aide dont a besoin, on pourra démarrer le plan aussitôt que possible.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright, let's give it our best shot.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: OK, on va essayer de faire du mieux que l'on peut.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That we will.\. See you soon!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: On va essayer.\. À bientôt !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Good night.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bonne nuit.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Bye!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Bye !

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sergey...\. you did it.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Sergey...\. Tu as réussi.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Unexpected Error
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Erreur Inattendue
